document_data.name: Unique Mageries
document_data.author: [[Nezram]]
document_data.mainbody: '''''Unique Mageries''''' was an [[arcane]] [[spellbook]] penned by [[Nezram]], a [[wizard]] who traveled the [[plane of existence|planes]] extensively. It contained 21 [[spell]]s ranging from common to unique or rare.
document_data.Description: ''Unique Mageries'' was a large tome that measured four handwidths wide by ten handwidths tall. Polished [[ivory]] formed both the front and rear cover. Each cover was decorated with inlaid ebony. Each of the 21 pages was gilt-edged and held a single spell.
document_data.Powers:
''Unique Mageries'' contained the following spells:
:''[[magic missile]]'' • ''[[stinking cloud]]'' • ''[[wizard lock]]'' • ''[[dispel magic]]'' • ''[[feign death]]'' • ''[[gust of wind]]'' • ''[[infravision]]'' • ''[[tongues]]'' • ''[[water breathing]]'' • ''[[fear]]'' • ''[[fumble]]'' • ''[[polymorph self]]'' • ''[[remove curse]]'' • ''[[wall of sand]]'' • ''[[wizard eye]]'' • ''[[telekinesis]]'' • ''[[anti-magic shell]]'' • ''[[Nezram's ruby ray]]'' • ''[[spelltrap]]'' • ''[[power word, blind]]'' • ''[[spellstrike]]''
document_data.History: Nezram left the tome behind on [[Toril]] sometime during the 7{{th}} century [[DR]] when he traveled to another plane and never returned. It was taken from Nezram's tower by the [[green dragon]] [[Chathuulandroth]] who held it within his lair for 600 years before [[adventurer]]s from the [[Black Gauntlet]] seized it from him. The book was rented to [[Elminster]] who copied its spells.
